name: Undead Frenzy VR
description:
From a mysterious graveyard, Studio Nine-9 brings you a timeless skeleton hunter, Virtual Reality Arcade Shooter with a twist.

Armed only with your trusted sawn-off shotgun, you must face the skeleton hoard alone, but they are a relentless enemy. The undead are always seeking you out; but if you remain alert you can gain power-ups such as invisibility, slow-mo and more.

As your kill count goes up, the more powerful you can become. How long can you survive the undead attack?

 How to play

  • Firstly, set up your VR headset and start the game.
  • You will need to use both controllers as you will have a gun in each hand.
  • The guns are always attached to your hands.
  • Shoot the Undead Frenzy logo with either one of the guns, using the trigger on the backside of the controller to start the game.
  • The game will start and enemies will start to run towards you from three different spawn points, marked by doorways.
  • Using the backside trigger, aim and shoot the enemies to earn points and survive for as long as possible.
  • Some enemies will throw projectiles that you need to dodge or catch depending on the colour of the projectile. These projectiles will be power-ups that can be activated with button presses.
    • Green – Adds health on pick up.
    • Red – Gives invincibility.
    • Blue – Gives slow-motion. 
    • White - Gives divine light.
    • The bomb-like projectile needs to be dodged, by leaning with the headset.
  • These are the controls for the power-ups: 
    • Invincibility – Move the left thumbstick left.
    • Slow Motion – Move left thumbstick down.
    • Divine Light – Move left thumbstick up.
  • The power-ups require a certain score to activate:
    • Slow Motion – 250.
    • Invincibility – 500.
    • Divine Light – 1000.
  • When you die, the arcade machine will show your score; to restart, you can shoot the logo again.
